name: Monster Land: Builder
description:
Have you ever wanted to make your own fantasy world? Monster Land will be the best sandbox-building game for you. In this open-world game, the possibilities are endless. You can build with no limitations or restrictions.

Feature
3D Pixel Art, Sandbox Play
Free building, place and rotate items anywhere freely and with no restrictions.
Collect resources and steal loot from other players to upgrade your own Village.
Defend against enemy attacks with a multitude of Towers, Bombs, Traps, and Walls.
Mine for resources and complete orders to earn gold coins to upgrade your own Village and turn it into a stronghold.
Delve deep into the sea expanses in search of treasure and raw materials with which to craft ever-evolving gear, machinery, and aesthetics

With the new survival mode, you can craft the world to your imagination. Mine for resources, harvest what you sow. Create all sorts of useful items. Discover countless treasures. Mine for resources, harvest what you sow. Create all sorts of useful items. But be careful on your travels, there are also creatures lurking out there that might not be friendly. If you enjoy games such as Minecraft, then you will love monster land. In the World of Monster Land, the choice is yours!
